about_the_game:
VRM can be loaded! The ultimate freedom of character!


This game can load VRM characters!
You can create your own characters using VRoidStudio*1 or downloaded characters from VRoidHub*2!
This allows for the ultimate freedom of character creation!

1 VRoid Studio
Software that allows anyone to easily create 3D characters by simply selecting body parts and clothing and changing various size values.

2 VRoid Hub
A website for sharing VRM characters.
There are many advanced characters that are difficult to create by yourself using only VRoid Studio, as well as characters that resemble anime characters.

Not only characters, but also exceptional “being there“ feeling and MR functions.


Of course, it doesn't end with just loading VRM characters and animating them!

The “ragdoll function” that adds colliders and physics to the loaded characters gives you the feeling that the characters are “right there”!

In addition, Quest3's MR function is also included!

By combining the ragdoll function with the MR function, you can experience as if the character has descended into your room!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Your own VRMs can be loaded! With the ultimate freedom of a self-made avatar, you can make your real favorite character appear in the game at will! Combined with the MR function of Quest3, you can have an amazing experience like never before!
